$interpreted:
Normal Soldier: Officer Jerome, the general we are waiting here for, 
Fredrica Lucien...what kind of person is she exactly?
Veteran Soldier: The only thing I've heard is that she's a powerful rune sorcerer. However, I've been in the army five years; never even met her...

Jerome: According to rumors, despite her top-notch abilities, she is lazy by nature. She constantly delays military orders for personal reasons...
...things like "need to catch up on sleep" or "need to take care of my skin".

Jerome: King Theodore got fed up with her antics, yet didn't want to just kick her out of the army since she's far too capable a general to let go. 
He had no choice but to relocate her to the borders...
Normal Soldier: Is it really okay to call someone like that back?
Veteran Soldier: He had no choice. With the civil war now grinding to a stalemate, he needs all the help he can get...
Jerome: ...Nonetheless, she is taking too long. What good is a soldier if she can't even follow basic orders and arrive on time...
Fredrica: Damnit! Men should all go to hell! This world doesn't need you!
Fredrica: ...*hiccup*...eternal love, bullcrap! I thought I finally met my love in a foreign place...
Fredrica: Turns out he's just another cheater. All men should die!
Jerome: This smell...you received the call-up, yet you still went drinking!?
Fredrica: ...Who the heck are you? You're not my type anyway!
Jerome: And a drunken rage now? Even though you're a general, you don't have the power to ignore military standards!
Fredrica: So~ noisy! The lady here is in a terrible mood right now. If you want to pick a fight, bring it!
Fredrica: Hahaha! Now you know how great...I am...
Jerome: She passed out?
Normal Soldier: So she took down all of us even though she's trashed? The rumors were true...
Jerome: What a troublesome person...pick her up and take her back to camp. We'll...
Lisa: The Kingdom of the Sun military officer there, please wait!
Lisa: ...Could you please release Ned? There must be some kind of misunderstanding!
Jerome: Ned?
Lisa: The Lizard that was taken away this morning. If you can't release him, at least let me see him. I beg you!

Jerome: Miss, please calm down. The Bazaar area is a neutral zone in the two countries' agreement. 

We will not use our military powers here, nor did we apprehend the person you mentioned.
Lisa: ...*sob*...why is this happening..we just got married. Why do they have to destroy our happiness...
Fredrica: Ugh...marriage...happiness...destroy...
Fredrica: Hold it right there!

Fredrica: That Ned guy you mentioned, is he your husband?
Are you certain that he was taken away by Kingdom of the Sun soldiers?
Lisa: ...*sob*...yes. They rushed into our home, said something about Ned being involved in terrorist activities, then they just took him away ...*sob*...
Lisa: Not even my father was able to get them to release him...
Jerome: We are not here for an incident like this. The Bazaar is under the control of the Commerce Chamber. You should ask them to...
Fredrica: That's terrible! How could they separate a loving couple without any proper explanation!?
Fredrica: Let me tell you. The one type of people I despise is worthless hacks who mess with other people's happy lives.
Jerome: Wait...General, you're not going to...
Fredrica: No need to worry, young lady. I, Kingdom arcane general Fredrica Lucien, will take care of this case for you!

Model.Text:
Officer Jerome, the general we are waiting here for, 
Fredrica Lucien...what kind of person is she exactly?
The only thing I've heard is that she's a powerful rune sorcerer. However, I've been in the army five years; never even met her...

According to rumors, despite her top-notch abilities, she is lazy by nature. She constantly delays military orders for personal reasons...
...things like "need to catch up on sleep" or "need to take care of my skin".

King Theodore got fed up with her antics, yet didn't want to just kick her out of the army since she's far too capable a general to let go. 
He had no choice but to relocate her to the borders...
Is it really okay to call someone like that back?
He had no choice. With the civil war now grinding to a stalemate, he needs all the help he can get...
...Nonetheless, she is taking too long. What good is a soldier if she can't even follow basic orders and arrive on time...
Damnit! Men should all go to hell! This world doesn't need you!
...*hiccup*...eternal love, bullcrap! I thought I finally met my love in a foreign place...
Turns out he's just another cheater. All men should die!
This smell...you received the call-up, yet you still went drinking!?
...Who the heck are you? You're not my type anyway!
And a drunken rage now? Even though you're a general, you don't have the power to ignore military standards!
So~ noisy! The lady here is in a terrible mood right now. If you want to pick a fight, bring it!
Hahaha! Now you know how great...I am...
She passed out?
So she took down all of us even though she's trashed? The rumors were true...
What a troublesome person...pick her up and take her back to camp. We'll...
The Kingdom of the Sun military officer there, please wait!
...Could you please release Ned? There must be some kind of misunderstanding!
Ned?
The Lizard that was taken away this morning. If you can't release him, at least let me see him. I beg you!

Miss, please calm down. The Bazaar area is a neutral zone in the two countries' agreement. 

We will not use our military powers here, nor did we apprehend the person you mentioned.
...*sob*...why is this happening..we just got married. Why do they have to destroy our happiness...
Ugh...marriage...happiness...destroy...
Hold it right there!

That Ned guy you mentioned, is he your husband?
Are you certain that he was taken away by Kingdom of the Sun soldiers?
...*sob*...yes. They rushed into our home, said something about Ned being involved in terrorist activities, then they just took him away ...*sob*...
Not even my father was able to get them to release him...
We are not here for an incident like this. The Bazaar is under the control of the Commerce Chamber. You should ask them to...
That's terrible! How could they separate a loving couple without any proper explanation!?
Let me tell you. The one type of people I despise is worthless hacks who mess with other people's happy lives.
Wait...General, you're not going to...
No need to worry, young lady. I, Kingdom arcane general Fredrica Lucien, will take care of this case for you!
